name: Bouncing Balls
overview: Bouncing Balls is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Markt & Technik, which was released in Europe in 1991. Two players thunder through three-dimensional landscapes with their balls. Who does the most laps in the given time? Bouncing Balls offers professional features such as split screen (split screen: each player sees the landscape from their own perspective) or level editor as well as many setting options (acceleration, friction, thrust of the balls, etc.) and extremely fast graphics. Bouncing balls, that's absolute ball fun for one or two players!
